EmailTemplate.name: Duplicate Case Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Update to Case#: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
We have received your recently submitted case; however an existing case for your dealership is currently being worked by our support team. The information from this case has been added to that existing case to ensure your issue is completely handled. If you have any further information to provide or would like to check the status of your case at any time, please call in to support and reference the existing case, #______.
Thank you very much for your time and efforts.
Sincerely, VinSolutions Support Team Support@vinsolutions.com 1-800-980-7488
